name: rdkit
description: port RDKit to js using emscripten

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-only
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cat javascript/pre.js build/src/rdkit.js javascript/post.js > dist/rdkit.js && cp build/src/rdkit.wasm dist/rdkit.wasm
scripts.build-new: mkdir -p dist && cat javascript/pre.js out/rdkit.js javascript/post.js > dist/rdkit.js && cp out/rdkit.wasm dist/rdkit.wasm
scripts.compile: npm run compile-emcc && npm run build-new

author: Guillaume Godin
